001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003public class WarbleNoise implements Noise.Noise3D {
004
005    private static final double[] ADJ = {-1.11, 1.41, 1.61};
006
007    public WarbleNoise(){
008        this(0x1234567890ABCDEFL);
009    }
010    public WarbleNoise(long seed) {
011        this.seed = seed;
012        workSeed[0] = workSeed[3] = DiverRNG.determine(seed);
013        workSeed[1] = workSeed[4] = DiverRNG.determine(seed + 1L);
014        workSeed[2] = workSeed[5] = DiverRNG.determine(seed + 2L);
015    }
016    protected long seed;
017    /**
018     * Where the extra outputs of {@link #getNoise(double, double, double)} and
019     * {@link #getNoiseWithSeed(double, double, double, long)} are stored; for 3D noise, items 0 through 2 store valid
020     * results, and for higher-dimensional noise up to 6 outputs can be requested.
021     */
022    public final double[] results = new double[6];
023    private final double[] working = new double[18];
024    private final long[] workSeed = new long[12];
025
026    @Override
027    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
028        working[0] = working[3] = working[6] = x;//+ NumberTools.swayRandomized(workSeed[0], z - y + 0.41) * 0.25;
029        working[1] = working[4] = working[7] = y;//+ NumberTools.swayRandomized(workSeed[1], x - z + 0.78) * 0.25;
030        working[2] = working[5] = working[8] = z;//+ NumberTools.swayRandomized(workSeed[2], y - x + 0.1) * 0.25;
031        warble(3);
032        warble(3);
033        warble(3);
034        for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
035            working[i] *= Math.PI;
036        }
037        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
038            results[i] = sway(i, 0, 3.0);
039        }
040        return results[0];
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
045        workSeed[0] = workSeed[3] = DiverRNG.determine(seed);
046        workSeed[1] = workSeed[4] = DiverRNG.determine(seed + 1L);
047        workSeed[2] = workSeed[5] = DiverRNG.determine(seed + 2L);
048        return getNoise(x, y, z);
049    }
050    private double sway(int element, int workingOffset, double seedChange) {
051        return NumberTools.swayRandomized(workSeed[element], working[element + 2 + workingOffset] - seedChange
052                + NumberTools.swayRandomized(workSeed[element + 2], working[element + 1 + workingOffset] + seedChange)
053                + NumberTools.swayRandomized(workSeed[element + 1], working[element + workingOffset] + seedChange + seedChange));
054    }
055//    private double sway(int element, int workingOffset, double seedChange) {
056//        return NumberTools.sin(workSeed[element] + seedChange + working[element + 2 + workingOffset]
057//                - NumberTools.sin(workSeed[element + 2] + seedChange + working[element + 1 + workingOffset])
058//                + NumberTools.sin(workSeed[element + 1] + seedChange + working[element + workingOffset]));
059//    }
060    private void warble(final int size){
061        System.arraycopy(working, 0, results, 0, size);
062        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
063            results[i] += sway(i, 1, 1.1) * 0.3;
064        }
065        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, size);
066        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size, size);
067        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size + size, size);
068        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
069            results[i] += sway(i, 2, 1.7) * 0.3;
070        }
071        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, size);
072        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size, size);
073        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size + size, size);
074        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
075            results[i] = (results[i] + sway(i, 0, 2.3)) * 0.3;
076        }
077        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, size);
078        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size, size);
079        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, size + size, size);
080    }
081
082    public double getPowerNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
083        working[0] = working[3] = working[6] = x;
084        working[1] = working[4] = working[7] = y;
085        working[2] = working[5] = working[8] = z;
086        results[0] = z + sway(0, 2, 0.0);
087        results[1] = x + sway(1, 2, 0.0);
088        results[2] = y + sway(2, 2, 0.0);
089        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 0, 3);
090        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 3, 3);
091        System.arraycopy(results, 0, working, 6, 3);
092        warble(3);
093        warble(3);
094        warble(3);
095        for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
096            working[i] *= Math.PI;
097        }
098        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
099            results[i] = sway(i, 0, 3.0);
100        }
101        return results[0];
102    }
103    public double getPowerNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
104        workSeed[0] = workSeed[3] = DiverRNG.determine(seed);
105        workSeed[1] = workSeed[4] = DiverRNG.determine(seed + 1L);
106        workSeed[2] = workSeed[5] = DiverRNG.determine(seed + 2L);
107        return getPowerNoise(x, y, z);
108    }
109
110    /*
111const float SEED = 42.0;
112const vec3 COEFFS = fract((SEED + 23.4567) * vec3(0.8191725133961645, 0.6710436067037893, 0.5497004779019703)) + 0.5;
113
114vec3 swayRandomized(vec3 seed, vec3 value)
115{
116    return sin(seed.xyz + value.zxy - cos(seed.zxy + value.yzx) + cos(seed.yzx + value.xyz));
117}
118
119vec3 cosmic(vec3 c, vec3 con)
120{
121    con += swayRandomized(c, con.yzx);
122    con += swayRandomized(c + 1.0, con.xyz);
123    con += swayRandomized(c + 2.0, con.zxy);
124    return con * 0.25;
125}
126
127void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
128{
129    // Normalized pixel coordinates (from 0 to 1)
130    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy * 64.0 + swayRandomized(COEFFS.zxy, (iTime * 0.1875) * COEFFS.yzx).xy * 32.0;
131    // aTime, s, and c could be uniforms in some engines.
132    float aTime = iTime * 0.0625;
133    vec3 adj = vec3(-1.11, 1.41, 1.61);
134    vec3 s = (swayRandomized(vec3(34.0, 76.0, 59.0), aTime + adj)) * 0.25;
135    vec3 c = (swayRandomized(vec3(27.0, 67.0, 45.0), aTime - adj)) * 0.25;
136    vec3 con = vec3(0.0004375, 0.0005625, 0.0008125) * aTime + c * uv.x + s * uv.y;
137
138    con = cosmic(COEFFS, con);
139    con = cosmic(COEFFS, con);
140    con = cosmic(COEFFS, con);
141
142    fragColor = vec4(swayRandomized(COEFFS + 3.0, con * (3.14159265)) * 0.5 + 0.5,1.0);
143}
144     */
145}
